text: Illā Al-Ladhīna Yaşilūna 'Ilá Qawmin Baynakum Wa Baynahum Mīthāqun 'Aw Jā'ūkum Ĥaşirat Şudūruhum 'An Yuqātilūkum 'Aw Yuqātilū Qawmahum Wa Law Shā'a Allāhu Lasallaţahum `Alaykum Falaqātalūkum Fa'ini A`tazalūkum Falam Yuqātilūkum Wa 'Alqaw 'Ilaykumu As-Salama Famā Ja`ala Allāhu Lakum `Alayhim Sabīlāan
